entry.summary: ...HEAVY RAIN FOR LATE WEEK INTO THE WEEKEND... A series of atmospheric rivers will move across the northern half of Southeast Alaska starting early Thursday near Yakutat, and then sliding over the northern inner channels on Friday. entry.summary: ...High Water In The Noatak, Kobuk And Koyukuk Valleys...
